mn139:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn139:2.2: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
mn139:2.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
mn139:3.1: “Na kamasukhamanuyunjeyya hinam gammam pothujjanikam anariyam anatthasamhitam, na ca attakilamathanuyogamanuyunjeyya dukkham anariyam anatthasamhitam.
mn139:3.2: Ete kho, bhikkhave, ubho ante anupagamma majjhima patipada tathagatena abhisambuddha, cakkhukarani nanakarani upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati.
mn139:3.4: ussadananca natva apasadananca natva nevussadeyya, na apasadeyya, dhammameva deseyya.
mn139:3.7: Rahovadam na bhaseyya, sammukha na khinam bhane.
mn139:4.1: ‘Na kamasukhamanuyunjeyya hinam gammam pothujjanikam anariyam anatthasamhitam, na ca attakilamathanuyogamanuyunjeyya dukkham anariyam anatthasamhitan’ti—
mn139:4.2: iti kho panetam vuttam; Kincetam paticca vuttam?
mn139:4.3: Yo kamapatisandhisukhino somanassanuyogo hino gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasamhito, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghato saupayaso saparilaho; micchapatipada.
mn139:4.4: Yo kamapatisandhisukhino somanassanuyogam ananuyogo hinam gammam pothujjanikam anariyam anatthasamhitam, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghato anupayaso aparilaho; sammapatipada.
mn139:4.5: Yo attakilamathanuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasamhito, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghato saupayaso saparilaho; micchapatipada.
mn139:4.6: Yo attakilamathanuyogam ananuyogo dukkham anariyam anatthasamhitam, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghato anupayaso aparilaho; sammapatipada.
mn139:4.7: ‘Na kamasukhamanuyunjeyya hinam gammam pothujjanikam anariyam anatthasamhitam, na ca attakilamathanuyogam anuyunjeyya dukkham anariyam anatthasamhitan’ti—
mn139:4.8: iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttam.
mn139:5.1: ‘Ete kho ubho ante anupagamma majjhima patipada tathagatena abhisambuddha, cakkhukarani nanakarani upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati’ti—
mn139:5.2: iti kho panetam vuttam. Kincetam paticca vuttam?
mn139:5.4: sammaditthi, sammasankappo, sammavaca, sammakammanto, sammaajivo, sammavayamo, sammasati, sammasamadhi.
mn139:5.5: ‘Ete kho ubho ante anupagamma majjhima patipada tathagatena abhisambuddha, cakkhukarani nanakarani upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati’ti—
mn139:5.6: iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttam.
mn139:6.2: ussadananca natva apasadananca natva nevussadeyya, na apasadeyya, dhammameva deseyya’ti—
mn139:6.3: iti kho panetam vuttam. Kincetam paticca vuttam?
mn139:7.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, ussadana ca hoti apasadana ca, no ca dhammadesana?
mn139:7.2: ‘Ye kamapatisandhisukhino somanassanuyogam anuyutta hinam gammam pothujjanikam anariyam anatthasamhitam, sabbe te sadukkha saupaghata saupayasa saparilaha micchapatipanna’ti—
mn139:7.4: ‘Ye kamapatisandhisukhino somanassanuyogam ananuyutta hinam gammam pothujjanikam anariyam anatthasamhitam, sabbe te adukkha anupaghata anupayasa aparilaha sammapatipanna’ti—
mn139:7.6: ‘Ye attakilamathanuyogam anuyutta dukkham anariyam anatthasamhitam, sabbe te sadukkha saupaghata saupayasa saparilaha micchapatipanna’ti—
mn139:7.8: ‘Ye attakilamathanuyogam ananuyutta dukkham anariyam anatthasamhitam, sabbe te adukkha anupaghata anupayasa aparilaha sammapatipanna’ti—
mn139:7.10: ‘Yesam kesanci bhavasamyojanam appahinam, sabbe te sadukkha saupaghata saupayasa saparilaha micchapatipanna’ti—
mn139:7.12: ‘Yesam kesanci bhavasamyojanam pahinam, sabbe te adukkha anupaghata anupayasa aparilaha sammapatipanna’ti—
mn139:7.14: Evam kho, bhikkhave, ussadana ca hoti apasadana ca, no ca dhammadesana.
mn139:8.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, nevussadana hoti na apasadana, dhammadesana ca?
mn139:8.2: ‘Ye kamapatisandhisukhino somanassanuyogam anuyutta hinam gammam pothujjanikam anariyam anatthasamhitam, sabbe te sadukkha saupaghata saupayasa saparilaha micchapatipanna’ti—
mn139:8.4: ‘Anuyogo ca kho sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghato saupayaso saparilaho;
mn139:8.7: ‘Ye kamapatisandhisukhino somanassanuyogam ananuyutta hinam gammam pothujjanikam anariyam anatthasamhitam, sabbe te adukkha anupaghata anupayasa aparilaha sammapatipanna’ti—
mn139:8.9: ‘Ananuyogo ca kho adukkho eso dhammo anupaghato anupayaso aparilaho;
mn139:8.12: ‘Ye attakilamathanuyogam anuyutta dukkham anariyam anatthasamhitam, sabbe te sadukkha saupaghata saupayasa saparilaha micchapatipanna’ti—
mn139:8.14: ‘Anuyogo ca kho sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghato saupayaso saparilaho;
mn139:8.17: ‘Ye attakilamathanuyogam ananuyutta dukkham anariyam anatthasamhitam, sabbe te adukkha anupaghata anupayasa aparilaha sammapatipanna’ti—
mn139:8.19: ‘Ananuyogo ca kho adukkho eso dhammo anupaghato anupayaso aparilaho;
mn139:8.22: ‘Yesam kesanci bhavasamyojanam appahinam, sabbe te sadukkha saupaghata saupayasa saparilaha micchapatipanna’ti—
mn139:8.24: ‘Bhavasamyojane ca kho appahine bhavopi appahino hoti’ti—
mn139:8.26: ‘Yesam kesanci bhavasamyojanam pahinam, sabbe te adukkha anupaghata anupayasa aparilaha sammapatipanna’ti—
mn139:8.28: ‘Bhavasamyojane ca kho pahine bhavopi pahino hoti’ti—
mn139:8.30: Evam kho, bhikkhave, nevussadana hoti na apasadana, dhammadesana ca.
mn139:8.32: ussadananca natva apasadananca natva nevussadeyya, na apasadeyya, dhammameva deseyya’ti—
mn139:8.33: iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttam.
mn139:9.3: iti kho panetam vuttam. Kincetam paticca vuttam?
mn139:9.6: Cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya,
mn139:9.10: kayavinneyya photthabba ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya—
mn139:9.12: Yam kho, bhikkhave, ime panca kamagune paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam idam vuccati kamasukham milhasukham puthujjanasukham anariyasukham.
mn139:9.13: ‘Na asevitabbam, na bhavetabbam, na bahulikatabbam, bhayitabbam etassa sukhassa’ti—vadami.
mn139:9.14: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
mn139:9.15: Vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
mn139:9.16: Pitiya ca viraga upekkhako ca viharati …pe… tatiyam jhanam …pe…
mn139:9.18: Idam vuccati nekkhammasukham pavivekasukham upasamasukham sambodhisukham.
mn139:9.19: ‘Asevitabbam, bhavetabbam, bahulikatabbam, na bhayitabbam etassa sukhassa’ti—vadami.
mn139:9.22: iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttam.
mn139:10.1: ‘Rahovadam na bhaseyya, sammukha na khinam bhane’ti—
mn139:10.4: Tatra, bhikkhave, yam janna rahovadam abhutam ataccham anatthasamhitam sasakkam tam rahovadam na bhaseyya.
mn139:10.5: Yampi janna rahovadam bhutam taccham anatthasamhitam tassapi sikkheyya avacanaya.
mn139:10.6: Yanca kho janna rahovadam bhutam taccham atthasamhitam tatra kalannu assa tassa rahovadassa vacanaya.
mn139:10.7: Tatra, bhikkhave, yam janna sammukha khinavadam abhutam ataccham anatthasamhitam sasakkam tam sammukha khinavadam na bhaseyya.
mn139:10.8: Yampi janna sammukha khinavadam bhutam taccham anatthasamhitam tassapi sikkheyya avacanaya.
mn139:10.9: Yanca kho janna sammukha khinavadam bhutam taccham atthasamhitam tatra kalannu assa tassa sammukha khinavadassa vacanaya.
mn139:10.10: ‘Rahovadam na bhaseyya, sammukha na khinam bhane’ti—
mn139:10.11: iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttam.
mn139:11.2: iti kho panetam vuttam. Kincetam paticca vuttam?
mn139:11.3: Tatra, bhikkhave, taramanassa bhasato kayopi kilamati, cittampi upahannati, saropi upahannati, kanthopi aturiyati, avisatthampi hoti avinneyyam taramanassa bhasitam.
mn139:11.4: Tatra, bhikkhave, ataramanassa bhasato kayopi na kilamati, cittampi na upahannati, saropi na upahannati, kanthopi na aturiyati, visatthampi hoti vinneyyam ataramanassa bhasitam.
mn139:11.6: iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttam.
mn139:12.2: iti kho panetam vuttam. Kincetam paticca vuttam?
mn139:12.3: Kathanca, bhikkhave, janapadaniruttiya ca abhiniveso hoti samannaya ca atisaro?
mn139:12.4: Idha, bhikkhave, tadevekaccesu janapadesu ‘pati’ti sanjananti, ‘pattan’ti sanjananti, ‘vittan’ti sanjananti, ‘saravan’ti sanjananti ‘dharopan’ti sanjananti, ‘ponan’ti sanjananti, ‘pisilavan’ti sanjananti.
mn139:12.5: Iti yatha yatha nam tesu tesu janapadesu sanjananti tatha tatha thamasa paramasa abhinivissa voharati:
mn139:12.7: Evam kho, bhikkhave, janapadaniruttiya ca abhiniveso hoti samannaya ca atisaro.
mn139:12.8: Kathanca, bhikkhave, janapadaniruttiya ca anabhiniveso hoti samannaya ca anatisaro?
mn139:12.9: Idha, bhikkhave, tadevekaccesu janapadesu ‘pati’ti sanjananti, ‘pattan’ti sanjananti, ‘vittan’ti sanjananti, ‘saravan’ti sanjananti, ‘dharopan’ti sanjananti, ‘ponan’ti sanjananti, ‘pisilavan’ti sanjananti.
mn139:12.10: Iti yatha yatha nam tesu tesu janapadesu sanjananti ‘idam kira me ayasmanto sandhaya voharanti’ti tatha tatha voharati aparamasam.
mn139:12.11: Evam kho, bhikkhave, janapadaniruttiya ca anabhiniveso hoti, samannaya ca anatisaro.
mn139:12.13: iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttam.
mn139:13.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yo kamapatisandhisukhino somanassanuyogo hino gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasamhito, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghato saupayaso saparilaho;
mn139:13.4: Tatra, bhikkhave, yo kamapatisandhisukhino somanassanuyogam ananuyogo hinam gammam pothujjanikam anariyam anatthasamhitam, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghato anupayaso aparilaho;
mn139:13.7: Tatra, bhikkhave, yo attakilamathanuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasamhito, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghato saupayaso saparilaho;
mn139:13.10: Tatra, bhikkhave, yo attakilamathanuyogam ananuyogo dukkham anariyam anatthasamhitam, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghato anupayaso aparilaho;
mn139:13.13: Tatra, bhikkhave, yayam majjhima patipada tathagatena abhisambuddha, cakkhukarani nanakarani upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghato anupayaso aparilaho;
mn139:13.16: Tatra, bhikkhave, yayam ussadana ca apasadana ca no ca dhammadesana, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghato saupayaso saparilaho;
mn139:13.19: Tatra, bhikkhave, yayam nevussadana ca na apasadana ca dhammadesana ca, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghato anupayaso aparilaho;
mn139:13.22: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidam kamasukham milhasukham pothujjanasukham anariyasukham, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghato saupayaso saparilaho;
mn139:13.25: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidam nekkhammasukham pavivekasukham upasamasukham sambodhisukham, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghato anupayaso aparilaho;
mn139:13.28: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvayam rahovado abhuto ataccho anatthasamhito, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghato saupayaso saparilaho;
mn139:13.31: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvayam rahovado bhuto taccho anatthasamhito, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghato saupayaso saparilaho;
mn139:13.34: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvayam rahovado bhuto taccho atthasamhito, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghato anupayaso aparilaho;
mn139:13.37: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvayam sammukha khinavado abhuto ataccho anatthasamhito, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghato saupayaso saparilaho;
mn139:13.40: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvayam sammukha khinavado bhuto taccho anatthasamhito, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghato saupayaso saparilaho;
mn139:13.43: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvayam sammukha khinavado bhuto taccho atthasamhito, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghato anupayaso aparilaho;
mn139:13.46: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidam taramanassa bhasitam, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghato saupayaso saparilaho;
mn139:13.49: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidam ataramanassa bhasitam, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghato anupayaso aparilaho;
mn139:13.52: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvayam janapadaniruttiya ca abhiniveso samannaya ca atisaro, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghato saupayaso saparilaho;
mn139:13.55: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvayam janapadaniruttiya ca anabhiniveso samannaya ca anatisaro, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghato anupayaso aparilaho;
mn139:14.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ‘sarananca dhammam janissama, arananca dhammam janissama;
mn139:14.2: sarananca dhammam natva arananca dhammam natva aranapatipadam patipajjissama’ti evanhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabbam.
mn139:14.3: Subhuti ca pana, bhikkhave, kulaputto aranapatipadam patipanno”ti.
mn139:14.5: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
